Academic Calendar Generator

Create detailed academic calendars for your institution by entering the semester start date and number of weeks. Generate calendars for different years and faculties.

Academic Calendar Configuration

Original Calendar Reference

This application is designed to recreate the academic calendar format from the University of Vavuniya's Faculty of Applied Science. Start by configuring your calendar parameters below, then generate to see the full calendar.

List older batches first (graduating students), followed by newer batches
